My Past Education

I completed my 10th in Swami Dayanand School, Tidka.

Recently, I completed my 12th in Jogeshwari High School, Ghatnandra.

I scored 76% in 12th class.

I scored 86% in 10th class.

Present Education :

I am currently studying Electrical Engineering at Sanjivani College of Engineering, Kopargaon.I am learning different subjects related to electrical machines, circuits, power systems, and basic programming. Along with my regular studies, I am also improving my skills in HTML, CSS, and other technical fields to build a strong future as an engineer.
